participant_1.background:
I love to dance because it is a fun way to express myself.
i still love my cat despite all this.
I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.
I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.
i have a pond at home with a pet koi named spot.

participant_2.background:
I now have more time to play music and tend to my garden.
I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband.
I'm not sure what a fortune teller could tell me, but I'm sure they'd be impressed by my talents and my love for my family.
my dad died when i was in high school.
I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.

content.text: Hi there! What are your hobbies?
Hello! I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband and playing video games.
That's cool! I enjoy dancing, writing songs and playing music.
Wow, I wish I could dance! I'm not very coordinated.
It's never too late to learn! I took dance lessons when I was in high school.
Maybe I'll look into it. I've always wanted to be able to dance.
I think you'd be great at it. You seem to have a good rhythm.
Thanks! I'm not sure about that, but I appreciate the compliment.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of music, but I mostly play rock and roll.
Nice! I like to play a lot of different genres too. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
As long as you're having fun, that's all that matters.
Thanks! It's always nice to meet someone who shares my hobbies.
Same here! I'm always looking for new people to play music with.
Maybe we could get together and jam sometime?
That would be fun! I'd love to
